## Data

```{r}
drug_df = 
  read_csv("./data/Accidental_Drug_Related_Deaths_2012-2018.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  separate(date, into = c("month", "day", "year"), sep = "/") %>% 
  separate(year, into = c("year", "del", "del_"), sep = " ") %>% 
  select(-del, -del_) %>% 
  separate(injury_city_geo, into = c("injury_city", "injury_geo"), sep = "CT") %>% 
  separate(injury_geo, into = c("inj_lat", "inj_long"), sep = ",") %>% 
    mutate(
    inj_lat = as.numeric(str_remove(inj_lat, "\\(")),
    inj_long = as.numeric(str_remove(inj_long, "\\)")),
    injury_city = str_remove(injury_city, "\\,")
  ) %>% 
  select(-date_type)
```

## 1. Bar plot: count vs age group with race group


```{r}
drug_df = 
  drug_df %>% 
  .[!is.na(drug_df$race), ] 

drug_df %>% 
  .[!is.na(drug_df$age), ] %>%  
  mutate(
  age_group = ifelse(
    age < 18, "<18", ifelse(
      age < 30 & age >= 18, "18~30", ifelse(
        age < 40 & age >= 30, "30~40", ifelse(
          age < 50 & age >= 40, "40~50", ifelse(
            age < 60 & age >= 50, "50~60", ifelse(
              age < 70 & age >= 60, "60~70", "70+"))))))) %>% 
  mutate(age_group = as.factor(age_group)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = age_group, fill = race)) + 
  geom_histogram(stat = "count", width = 0.6) + 
  labs(
    title = "Age group vs Death count", 
    x = "Age group", 
    y = "Death count due to drugs") + 
  theme_bw() + 
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5), 
    legend.text = element_text(size = 8)) + 
  guides(col = guide_legend(nrow = 2))
```


## 2. Volin plot: Fatalcases causing by drug between gender

```{r include=FALSE}
#all opiates are opioids, not all opioids are opiates.
drug_df = 
  drug_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    heroin:any_opioid,
    names_to = "drug_name",
    values_to = "drug_use") %>% 
  drop_na(drug_use) 

voline_plot = drug_df %>%
         mutate(drug = as.factor(drug_name)) %>%
         group_by(drug) %>%
         mutate(count = n()) %>%
         select(age, race, sex, drug, count) %>%
         drop_na() %>%
         arrange(desc(count))

Top10 = voline_plot %>%
        group_by(drug) %>% 
        summarise(count = n()) %>%
        top_n(10) %>%
        arrange(desc(count))
  
#kableExtra::kable(Top10)
```

```{r warning=FALSE}
voline_plot %>%
  plot_ly(type = 'violin') %>%
  add_trace(
    x = ~drug[voline_plot$sex == 'Male'], y = ~age[voline_plot$sex == 'Male'],
    legendgroup = 'Male', scalegroup = 'Male', name = 'Male',
    side = 'negative',
    box = list(visible = T),
    meanline = list(visible = T),
    line = list(color = '')) %>%
  add_trace(
    x = ~drug[voline_plot$sex == 'Female'], y = ~age[voline_plot$sex == 'Female'],
    legendgroup = 'Female', scalegroup = 'Female', name = 'Female',
    side = 'positive',
    box = list(visible = T),
    meanline = list(visible = T),
    line = list(color = ''),
    marker = list(
        line = list(
          width = 2,
          color = ""
        ))) %>% 
  layout(
    xaxis = list(title = "use of drug ", rangeslider = list(type = "drug")),
    yaxis = list(title = "Distribution among Ages ", zeroline = F),
    violingap = 0.5,
    violingroupgap = 0,
    violinmode = 'overlay',
    colorway = c('#cd7eaf','blue')
    )
```


## 3. Spaghetti plot: no. of death vs. time (group by types of drug)

```{r}
spaghetti_plot = drug_df %>% 
  mutate(
    date = as.Date(with(drug_df, paste(year, month, day, sep = "-")), "%Y-%m-%d")
  ) %>% 
  drop_na(date) %>% 
  arrange(date) %>% 
  group_by(date, drug_name) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = n, color = drug_name)) +
  geom_line() +
  xlab("Date") +
  ylab("Number of death") 

ggplotly(spaghetti_plot)
```


## 4. Heat map showing the number of death in each drug type across the year

```{r}
drug_df %>% 
  mutate(
    month = match(pull(drug_df, month), month.name), 
    date = as.Date(with(drug_df, paste(year, as.numeric(month), day, sep = "-")), "%Y-%m-%d")
  ) %>% 
  drop_na(date) %>% 
  arrange(date) %>% 
  group_by(date, drug_name) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = drug_name, y = date)) +
  geom_bin2d() +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "steelblue") +
  xlab("Date") +
  ylab("Number of death") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 10), panel.background = element_blank()) 
```
